name: Scrap Bot
innate: Gains +1/+1 each combat turn (Synth scaling)

name: Proxy Node
innate: Whenever an adjacent ally is buffed, Proxy Node gains the same buff. Starts with 3 shield

name: Wire Rat
innate: On buy: +1 ATK to a random Synth ally. In combat: gains +1 ATK on each hit

name: Chip Miner
innate: On buy: gain 1g. Every 3rd Synth = 3g bonus. In combat: +1/+1 per turn

name: Assembly Unit
innate: On death: splits into two units with 60% stats (inherits buffs)

name: Sentinel
innate: Firewall — absorbs the first enemy innate ability that would target any ally, negating it entirely

name: Turret Node
innate: Lock-On — consecutive hits on same target deal +3 cumulative bonus damage

name: Power Grid
innate: Overclock — at combat start, highest-ATK Synth gains +50% ATK (no penalty)

name: War Machine
innate: Payload — first attack deals triple damage. If it kills, the next Synth to attack also gets triple on their next hit (chain)

name: Compile Core
innate: Compile — copies 1 random ally innate at combat start. Regenerates 1 HP per turn

name: Overclock Drone
innate: Overheat — attacks 3x speed but takes 1 self-damage per attack. If it dies from self-damage, explodes for ATK×2 to all enemies

name: Foundry Arm
innate: Fabricate — at combat start, spawns a 2/2 Construct Token (Synth+Construct)

name: Omega Frame
innate: Kernel Panic — the first time this unit would die, instead heals to 50% HP and doubles its ATK for the rest of combat

name: Mainframe
innate: Broadcast — whenever any Synth triggers its innate ability, Mainframe triggers it a second time (doubles all Synth innates)

name: Arc Welder
innate: Arc Chain — attack bounces to a 2nd enemy for 75% damage, then a 3rd for 50%. Each bounce applies on-hit effects

name: Singularity
innate: Merge Protocol — at combat start, absorbs the stats of the two weakest Synth allies (they vanish, Singularity gains all their ATK+HP)

name: Quantum Core
innate: Superposition — exists as 2 copies of itself simultaneously. When one takes damage, 50% is redirected to the other copy

name: Nexus Prime
innate: All Synth innate abilities that reference a number have that number doubled ("+2 ATK" becomes "+4 ATK", "deal 3 damage" becomes "deal 6 damage")

name: God Compiler
innate: Infinite Loop — at combat start, every Synth innate ability on your board triggers 3 times sequentially before combat begins

name: Assembly Matrix
innate: Reassemble — whenever ANY ally dies, Assembly Matrix permanently gains their innate ability (stacks all collected innates)

name: Net Runner
innate: Siphon Strike — on hit, steal 1 ATK from target AND give it to a random ally (net -1/+1 ATK swing)

name: Data Leech
innate: Drain — on hit, heal HP equal to 50% of damage dealt

name: Ping Flood
innate: Jam — at combat start, the fastest enemy unit's attack speed is reduced by 50%

name: Access Point
innate: Backdoor — on buy, peek at your next opponent's board (reveals their unit positions and stats for 1 round)

name: Crypto Breaker
innate: Breach — all damage this unit deals is True Damage (ignores shields, damage reduction, and all defensive innates)

name: Glitch Imp
innate: Corrupt Memory — on hit, target's innate ability is replaced with "take 1 damage per turn" for the rest of combat

name: Packet Sniffer
innate: Vulnerability Scan — always targets the enemy with the most remaining keywords/innate effects, dealing +3 bonus damage to them

name: Trojan Gate
innate: Payload Delivery — on death, plants a trojan on killer: killer's next 3 attacks hit their own allies instead

name: Ghost Protocol
innate: Zero-Day Ambush — untargetable for 2 turns. First attack from stealth applies all on-hit effects on your board to the target simultaneously

name: Phreaker
innate: Wiretap — on buy, steal a random unit from your next opponent's shop (they lose it, you gain it free)

name: Exploit Kit
innate: Stack Overflow — deals bonus damage equal to the number of debuffs/negative effects on the target ×3

name: DDoS Node
innate: Throttle — all enemies attack 30% slower. For each Hacker on your board, throttle increases by +10%

name: Zero Day
innate: Full Wipe — on hit, permanently removes ALL keywords from target (not just 1). Target also loses their innate for the rest of combat

name: Black Hat
innate: Rootkit — the first enemy unit to attack each combat has its damage redirected to a random enemy ally instead

name: Ransomware
innate: Encryption — on kill, the victim's remaining HP becomes gold for you next round (2 HP = 1g)

name: Root Access
innate: Hijack — at combat start, permanently steal the strongest enemy's innate ability (they lose it, you gain it on this unit)

name: Void Reaper
innate: Execute Protocol — targets weakest enemy. If target is below 33% HP at any point, instantly kill it. Each execute makes the threshold +5% higher

name: Shadow Broker
innate: Information Warfare — at combat start, swap the ATK and HP of the 2 strongest enemy units (their tanks become glass, their glass becomes tanks)

name: Zero Day Prime
innate: Total Blackout — at combat start, ALL enemy innate abilities and keywords are disabled for the first 5 attacks. Each Hacker extends this by +2 attacks

name: Root Shell
innate: Man-in-the-Middle — all enemy buffs and healing are intercepted and applied to Root Shell instead. Enemies literally cannot buff themselves

name: Street Samurai
innate: Bushido — if this unit survived last combat, it permanently gains +2 ATK. Stacks every round it survives

name: Reflex Agent
innate: Counter-Strike — whenever this unit dodges or takes 0 damage from any source, immediately attacks back

name: Knuckle Duster
innate: Haymaker — every 3rd attack is a critical hit dealing 3× damage

name: Iron Hide
innate: Thick Skin — takes 1 less damage from all sources. Each time it takes reduced damage, gains +1 permanent HP

name: Chrome Fist
innate: Shatter — attacks destroy enemy shields entirely (not just damage through them—the shield is deleted)

name: Nano Medic
innate: Combat Stim — at combat start, injects the lowest-HP ally with a stim: they heal 2 HP after every attack they make

name: Blade Runner
innate: Cleave Through — on kill, excess overkill damage carries over to the next target in line

name: Steel Spine
innate: Grit — the first time HP would drop to 0, survive at 1 HP and gain +5 ATK for the rest of combat (once per combat)

name: Titan Arm
innate: Adrenaline Surge — each time this unit takes damage, gains +ATK equal to damage taken. Pain literally makes it stronger

name: Exo Frame
innate: Bodyguard — redirects the first attack targeting each adjacent ally to itself instead (absorbs up to 3 redirected hits total)

name: Pain Engine
innate: Blood Rage — attacks deal bonus damage equal to missing HP. At 1 HP, every attack is devastating

name: Riot Shield
innate: Cover Fire — while alive, all allies take 30% less damage from AoE/splash effects. On death, this protection transfers to the next highest-HP ally

name: Berserker X
innate: Blood Frenzy — below 50% HP, attacks twice per turn. Below 25% HP, attacks three times per turn

name: Warlord
innate: Rally Cry — at start of each round, the Augmented unit that dealt the most damage last combat permanently gains +2/+2 (rewards your MVP)

name: Gore Machine
innate: Rampage — on kill, immediately attacks again with +2 ATK. Chains indefinitely as long as each attack kills

name: Apex Predator
innate: Hunt the Weak — always targets the lowest-HP enemy. If the attack would overkill, excess damage hits a random second enemy

name: War Titan
innate: Unstoppable Force — immune to all displacement, stat reduction, and crowd control effects. Keywords cannot be removed or silenced from this unit

name: Juggernaut
innate: Momentum — each attack deals +1 cumulative bonus damage (1st hit +1, 2nd hit +2, 3rd +3…). Cannot be one-shot; minimum 2 hits to kill

name: Omega Predator
innate: Apex Carnage — on kill, heals to half HP AND permanently gains the victim base ATK

name: The Colosseum
innate: Gladiator Arena — forces ALL enemies to attack this unit one at a time in sequence. While The Colosseum lives, no other ally can be targeted

name: Micro Drone
innate: Replicate — on death, spawn two 1/1 Micro Drones (they also have Replicate but spawn one 1/1) — splits recursively once

name: Scout Fly
innate: First Strike — always attacks before any non-Scout unit. If this kills its target, gain +1/+1 permanently

name: Zap Bug
innate: Static Discharge — on death, paralyze the killer for 1 attack (they skip their next turn)

name: Relay Drone
innate: Signal Boost — all Drone innate abilities within 2 board positions gain +1 to their numeric values

name: Buzz Swarm
innate: Fission — on death, splits into 2 copies with half current stats each (rounded up). Copies inherit all buffs

name: Pulse Drone
innate: Target Designator — marks an enemy at combat start. All Drones deal +2 damage to the marked target. On mark death, re-marks next target

name: Kamikaze Bot
innate: Payload — on death, deal damage equal to its CURRENT ATK (not base — benefits from all buffs) to the unit that killed it

name: Repair Drone
innate: Field Repair — after each Drone death on your side, heals all surviving Drones for 2 HP

name: Hive Mind
innate: Neural Link — all Drones share a combined HP pool. Damage to any Drone is distributed equally across all living Drones

name: Strike Wing
innate: Dive Bomb — attacks the enemy backline (last position). Each kill moves its targeting one position forward

name: Cluster Bomb
innate: Chain Detonation — on death, deal 2 damage to all enemies. If this kills any enemy, THEY also explode for 1 damage each

name: Shield Drone
innate: Ablative Plating — at combat start, give Shield to each ally equal to the total number of Drones on your board

name: Mothership
innate: Deploy — every 4th combat turn, spawn a 2/2 Drone in an empty slot. Drones spawned this way have the innate of a random Drone you own

name: Swarm Lord
innate: Swarm Tactics — for each Drone that has died this combat, all surviving Drones gain +1 ATK permanently

name: Predator Drone
innate: Stealth Payload — untargetable for the first 3 enemy attacks. While stealthed, attacks ignore shields and deal True Damage

name: Legion Swarm
innate: Assimilate — each time a Drone dies, Legion Swarm absorbs it (gaining its remaining ATK permanently). Grows from swarm attrition

name: Omega Swarm
innate: Critical Mass — at combat start, if you have 5+ Drones on board, ALL Drones gain +100% ATK for the entire combat

name: Hive Queen
innate: Royal Decree — while alive, all Drones that die are re-spawned at 1 HP after a 2-turn delay (each drone revives once)

name: Swarm Singularity
innate: Black Hole — on death, consume ALL surviving Drones. Deal combined total ATK of all consumed Drones as damage split across all enemies

name: The Motherbrain
innate: Overmind — all Drones gain the innate ability of every other Drone on your board. Each Drone becomes a composite of all Drone innates

name: Mind Spark
innate: Premonition — at combat start, grants your weakest ally +3 Shield. If that ally would die first, they survive the killing blow at 1 HP instead

name: Thought Wisp
innate: Psychic Echo — whenever an ally activates a combat-start innate, Thought Wisp gains +1/+1 permanently

name: Psi Probe
innate: Mind Spike — at combat start, deal damage to a random enemy equal to the number of Psionics on your board

name: Aura Sprite
innate: Resonance — gains +1 ATK for every active Shield on your board at combat start (counts total shield HP/5, rounded up)

name: Thought Weaver
innate: Psychic Barrier — at combat start, generate a Shield for your entire board equal to Thought Weaver's current ATK

name: Dream Walker
innate: Nightmare — when attacked, attacker falls asleep: they skip their next attack and Dream Walker attacks them instead

name: Mind Blade
innate: Psychic Edge — all damage this unit deals bypasses shields and hits HP directly. Also drains 1 Shield from target per hit

name: Psychic Wall
innate: Telekinetic Barrier — at combat start, choose the 2 highest-ATK enemies and reduce their ATK by 2 for the duration of combat

name: Dream Eater
innate: Devour Thoughts — on hit, steal 2 of the target's max HP permanently (target's max HP shrinks, Dream Eater's grows)

name: Mind Crusher
innate: Psychic Overload — on hit, if target has any keywords, remove one AND deal bonus damage equal to 3× the number of keywords removed this combat

name: Psi Storm
innate: Psionic Tempest — every 3rd turn, deal damage equal to this unit's ATK to ALL enemies. Each cast permanently costs 1 HP from Psi Storm

name: Aura Guard
innate: Reflective Ward — allies within 2 positions reflect 30% of damage taken back to the attacker as Psionic (true) damage

name: Oracle Node
innate: Foresight — at combat start, rearranges your entire board into the optimal attack order against the current enemy lineup

name: Dominator
innate: Mind Control — at combat start, take permanent control of the weakest enemy unit. It fights for you with full stats and innate

name: Empathic Core
innate: Soul Bond — whenever any ally dies, Empathic Core absorbs their spirit: permanently gains +2/+2 AND their innate fires one final time

name: Ascendant
innate: Transcendence — at combat start, all allies gain Shield equal to their TIER × 3 (T1=3, T3=9, T6=18). Shields persist between combats

name: Neural Titan
innate: Psionic Suppression — enemies lose ATK = Psionic count (max -4)

name: Mind Lord
innate: Amplify — all Psionic innate abilities that deal damage or grant shield have their values increased by 50%

name: The Overmind
innate: Collective Consciousness — at combat start, take control of the enemy unit with the most keywords/abilities. Additionally, ALL your psionic combat-start effects trigger twice

name: Psi Nexus
innate: Reality Rewrite — at combat start, swap your weakest ally ATK/HP with the strongest enemy ATK/HP

name: Microbe
innate: Patient Zero — on hit, infect target (takes 1 damage per turn). If target dies while infected, infection spreads to 2 adjacent enemies at double strength

name: Spore Pod
innate: Sporulate — on death, release spores: ALL enemies gain 1 stack of Infection (1 damage per turn per stack)

name: Carrier
innate: Vector — on hit, transfers ALL infection stacks from Carrier to the target (Carrier accumulates stacks from standing near infected allies)

name: Fever Spike
innate: Inflammatory Response — at combat start, deal 1 damage to ALL units on BOTH sides. Your Virus units heal from this instead

name: Plague Rat
innate: Pestilence — attacks apply 2 stacks of Infection. If target already has Infection, the stacks are doubled instead

name: Contagion
innate: Weakening Plague — infected enemies have their ATK reduced by 1 per Infection stack they carry

name: Mutagen
innate: Adaptive Mutation — each turn, randomly gain one of: +2 ATK, +2 HP, +1 ATK speed, or a random keyword. Permanent. Never the same mutation twice

name: Incubator
innate: Gestation — each turn Incubator is alive, it's growing internally. On death, spawns a unit with ATK/HP equal to the number of turns it survived ×2

name: Pandemic
innate: Airborne — infection damage now triggers twice per turn for all enemies. Additionally, infection spreads to random uninfected enemies each turn

name: Viral Storm
innate: Cytokine Storm — on death, every infected enemy takes instant damage equal to their total Infection stacks ×2

name: Necrosis
innate: Tissue Death — on hit, permanently reduce target's max HP by 2 (they can never heal above the new max). Stacks on repeated hits

name: Bio-Forge
innate: Splice — at round start, consume a Virus unit from your bench to give a board Virus unit +ATK/+HP equal to the consumed unit's stats

name: Outbreak Prime
innate: Superspreader — at combat start, every Virus unit on your board applies 1 Infection stack to ALL enemies simultaneously

name: Apex Strain
innate: Apex Evolution — on kill, mutate: permanently gain the victim's highest stat AND their innate ability for the rest of this combat

name: Patient Zero
innate: Plague Origin — cannot die from combat damage while any enemy is infected. Instead, surviving at 1 HP. Only dies when no enemies carry Infection

name: Legion Virus
innate: Pandemic Protocol — each attack hits the target AND spreads 1 Infection stack to every other enemy. Attack damage increases by +1 per total Infection stack on all enemies

name: Extinction Event
innate: Doomsday Pathogen — on death, ALL enemies receive 2 Infection stacks

name: Plague Lord
innate: Lord of Rot — all Infection damage heals Plague Lord. Additionally, all Virus on-death effects trigger at double value

name: Omega Strain
innate: Terminal Infection — Infection stacks deal 50% more damage per tick

name: Patient Infinity
innate: Endless Mutation — on death, revive once at 1 HP with base stats

name: Flicker
innate: Phase Shift — 35% dodge chance. Each dodge grants +3 ATK

name: Phase Wisp
innate: Ambush — starts combat phased out (untargetable). First attack from phase deals 3× damage. Takes 2 turns to re-phase after attacking

name: Echo Shade
innate: Afterimage — on death, leaves a Ghost with 1 HP that copies this unit's last action every turn (attacks the same target for 1 damage each turn)

name: Mist Walker
innate: Obscuring Mist — all allies have 15% miss chance applied to enemy attacks against them. Miss chance stacks with multiple Mist Walkers

name: Phase Knight
innate: Dimensional Armor — every other attack passes through this unit harmlessly (takes damage from 1st, dodges 2nd, takes 3rd, dodges 4th…)

name: Blink Striker
innate: Blink Strike — teleports to attack the enemy backline. After killing, blinks to the NEXT backline target. Cannot be counter-attacked while blinking

name: Mirror Ghost
innate: Doppelganger — ghost copy of strongest enemy (60% stats, lasts 4 attacks)

name: Void Step
innate: Dimensional Rift — on death, swap positions of 2 random enemy units AND apply a 2-turn stun to both (they skip 2 attacks from disorientation)

name: Specter
innate: Incorporeal — immune to all on-hit effects, debuffs, and innate abilities. Can only be damaged by raw attack damage

name: Phase Assassin
innate: Mark for Death — at combat start, mark the highest-ATK enemy. Phase Assassin is permanently phased until it attacks the marked target, dealing 2× damage. After the kill, re-marks and re-phases

name: Rift Walker
innate: Dimensional Shuffle — after each attack, swap positions with a random ally. The swapped ally gets +2 ATK from the dimensional energy

name: Soul Echo
innate: Haunting Presence — on death, become a Ghost that persists for 5 turns. Ghost can't be targeted but deals this unit's ATK as true damage to a random enemy each turn

name: Dimension Ripper
innate: Rift Slash — each attack tears a rift. Rifts deal 1 damage per turn to the nearest enemy. Rifts persist and stack (3 attacks = 3 separate rifts ticking)

name: Phase Lord
innate: Phantom Veil — all Phantom allies gain 25% dodge chance. Each successful dodge by ANY Phantom gives Phase Lord +1 permanent ATK

name: Void Dancer
innate: Dance of Shadows — alternates between being targetable and untargetable each turn. While untargetable, attacks deal True Damage

name: Ascendant Shade
innate: Soul Harvest — on kill, become the killed unit (gain its stats, innate, and keywords) while retaining Soul Harvest. Chain-kills chain-transforms

name: Reality Tear
innate: Dimensional Collapse — every 4th turn, pull ALL enemies into the void: each takes damage equal to Reality Tear's ATK divided across them, and are stunned for 1 turn

name: Null Entity
innate: Void Existence — immune to ALL effects, keywords, innates, and targeted abilities from both sides. Pure stat-stick that cannot be buffed or debuffed by anything

name: Event Horizon
innate: Gravity Well — at combat start, pull all enemies 1 position toward Event Horizon (compresses their formation). Enemies adjacent to Event Horizon have their ATK halved

name: The Unseen
innate: Perfect Stealth — permanently untargetable. Attacks the highest-ATK enemy. Each kill grants +3/+3. The only way to damage The Unseen is AoE or splash effects

name: Foundation
innate: Cornerstone — all Constructs on your board gain +1 max HP per round. Foundation is the HP engine for late-game

name: Brick Golem
innate: Hardened — has a damage cap: cannot take more than 3 damage from any single attack (excess is negated)

name: Iron Seed
innate: Germinate — on buy, immediately grow: gain +2/+2 for each other Construct you already own

name: Pillar Shard
innate: Crumble — on death, shatter into debris: deal 1 damage to all enemies for each 5 max HP this unit had (scales with buffs)

name: Stone Sentinel
innate: Petrifying Gaze — the first enemy to attack Stone Sentinel is petrified: loses 50% ATK for the rest of combat

name: Growth Engine
innate: Deep Roots — gains +1/+2 permanently each round on board. Cannot be moved, sold, or repositioned once placed (committed)

name: Rune Carver
innate: Inscription — at combat start, inscribe a Rune onto the highest-HP ally: that ally gains "reflect 2 damage back to attacker on each hit taken"

name: Fossil Core
innate: Fossilize — on death, the killer gains -3 ATK permanently (petrification curse) AND a random ally Construct gains Fossil Core's remaining max HP

name: Monolith
innate: Ancient Power — at combat start, all allies gain Shield equal to 10% of Monolith's current max HP. Monolith gains +2 max HP per round passively

name: Architect
innate: Blueprint — at round start, choose one ally to "reinforce": that ally permanently gains +0/+4 and takes 1 less damage from all sources this combat

name: Siege Tower
innate: Demolition — deals double damage to enemies with Shield or any damage reduction effect. Anti-tank specialist

name: Relic Guard
innate: Ancient Ward — the first time each ally would take lethal damage, they instead survive at 1 HP (once per ally per combat). Relic Guard loses 2 HP each time this triggers

name: Titan Wall
innate: Bastion — absorbs 30% of ALL damage that would hit ANY ally. Titan Wall takes this damage instead. Essentially a board-wide damage sponge

name: War Totem
innate: Inspiring Monument — all allies deal bonus damage equal to 10% of War Totem's current HP (30 HP totem = +3 damage to all). Incentivizes stacking HP on this unit

name: Siege Ram
innate: Battering Force — first attack deals damage equal to this unit's TOTAL HP instead of ATK (a 20 HP Siege Ram's first hit does 20 damage)

name: Eternal Engine
innate: Perpetual Motion — regenerate 3 HP at the start of every turn. Whenever Eternal Engine heals, the lowest-HP ally also heals for the same amount

name: World Shaper
innate: Terraform — at combat start, restructure the battlefield: all allies gain +HP equal to their position number ×2 (pos 1=+2, pos 7=+14). Rewards full boards

name: Living Fortress
innate: Citadel — while alive, all allies cannot be reduced below 25% HP by any single attack. Additionally on death, all surviving allies gain Fortress's max HP ÷ 4 as permanent HP

name: The Colossus
innate: Living Monolith — survives first lethal hit with 1 HP. On kill, gains +3/+3 permanently

name: Genesis Monument
innate: Eternal Foundation — cannot be killed while any other Construct ally is alive (redirects lethal damage to nearest Construct). On death, ALL allies permanently gain +3/+3 and full heal

name: Merc For Hire
innate: Flexible Contract — counts as every faction simultaneously for all synergy bonuses. The universal glue unit

name: Junk Dealer
innate: Recycle — when you sell any unit, gain +1 bonus gold (normally selling gives back half cost; Junk Dealer adds +1 on top)

name: Stray Cat
innate: Nine Lives — the first 2 times this would die, instead survive at 1 HP and gain +2 ATK. Third death is final

name: Scavenger
innate: Scavenge — at the start of each shop phase, gain 1g for each empty board slot you have. Rewards staying small

name: Street Doc
innate: Back-Alley Surgery — at combat start, fully heal the most damaged ally AND remove all debuffs/infections/negative effects from them

name: Arms Dealer
innate: Arms Supply — on buy, choose any ally on your board: give them a random keyword they don't already have (permanent)

name: Alley Rat
innate: Pickpocket — on hit, steal a random buff from the target (if they gained +ATK from any source, you take it). What's theirs is yours

name: Barricade
innate: Roadblock — at combat start, the 2 lowest-position enemies are delayed: they don't attack for the first 2 turns

name: Bounty Hunter
innate: Bounty — at combat start, mark the highest-tier enemy. Killing the bounty target grants +5 permanent ATK and 2 bonus gold next round

name: Fixer
innate: Black Market Access — on buy, gain 2g. Additionally, your shop next round contains 1 unit from the tier ABOVE your current level

name: Smuggler
innate: Contraband — on buy, a random unit in your next shop costs 0g. You don't know which one until you see it

name: Enforcer
innate: Protection Racket — deals +4 bonus damage to enemies with NO keywords (punishes vanilla stat-sticks). Deals +2 to enemies with only 1 keyword

name: Black Market
innate: Laundering — on buy, gain 3g. Additionally at round start, convert your interest gold into +1/+1 stats distributed randomly among your board (money becomes power)

name: War Profiteer
innate: War Economy — permanently gains +1/+0 for every unit ANY player buys or sells. Scales with lobby activity, not just your actions

name: Lone Wolf
innate: Solo Operative — if this is the ONLY non-Neutral unit on your board, triple all its stats. If it's the only unit period, quadruple

name: Rogue AI
innate: Adaptive Intelligence — at combat start, analyze the entire enemy board and gain the single best counter-innate: the innate that would be most effective against their specific lineup

name: Doomsday Bot
innate: Dead Man's Switch — on death, the enemy PLAYER takes direct damage equal to Doomsday Bot's ATK ÷ 2 (ignores unit combat, hits their HP directly)

name: Merc Captain
innate: Full Roster Bonus — for each UNIQUE faction on your board, all allies gain +1/+1

name: The Architect
innate: Grand Design — at combat start, activate every combat-start innate on your board ONE ADDITIONAL TIME. Doubles all setup

name: Chaos Engine
innate: Entropy — at the end of each combat turn, a completely random event occurs: random unit gains +5 ATK, random unit takes 5 damage, random unit swaps stats, random keyword applied, etc. Pure chaos
